name: Paradise Beach: resorts tycoon sim strategy
name_original: Paradise Beach: resorts tycoon sim strategy
description:
Paradise Beach is an addictive, tycoon-style, click management game where you have been selected to design, build and manage some of the world's leading beach resorts. Select and build different things to amuse and please the people that visit your resort. New elements are gradually introduced to the plot to keep the game both interesting and challenging. Work your way to the top as you manage the construction of the world's leading beach resorts.

Features:

- Simply addictive. Easy to start, but difficult to stop
- Good mix of tycoon-style and click management mechanics with "Where's Waldo" hidden object hunts
- Total freedom of action!
- Infinite “replayability” as every new beach is different
- Two game play modes
- Great plot that gradually adds new elements to keep the game interesting and challenging
- Amazing graphics

Paradise Beach's bright graphics, total freedom of action, two modes of game play make it possible for you to let your imagination go completely wild as you design the most improbable and grandiose beach resorts.
